description:
Lina`s party faces Fiblizo, but none of their magic works on him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les âmes mortes ! (L`ultime décision de Lina)
Shiseru Mono no Tamashii! Lina Saigo no Ketsudan!
Sufletele morţilor / Decizia finală a Linei
The Souls of the Dead! Lina`s Final Decision!
死せる者の魂! リナ最後の決断!
